item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

I added these specials

[code]public void DragonDagger(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1215) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 2) {
hitDiff = 12;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(1068);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 2; // Specs - By Sam Server
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs - Sam Server
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Dagger”);
}

}[/code]

[code]public void emoteCry() //
{
DragonDagger();

}[/code]

And this is what happens if i click on DDS

And this is weird when i log in with dragon dagger i get a purple spec at my feet but thats only when i wear a dds
man i need my dds working =[

Read full topic
